name: Hotteok Bliss
detail: Sweeten your day with our Hotteok pancakes, oozing warmth with a delectable mix of brown sugar, honey, and nuts.

name: Kimchi Hotteok
detail: Experience the perfect blend of savory and sweet with our kimchi-filled pancakes, a delightful twist on a beloved treat.
